Others: With India having won their first two matches of the ongoing T20 World Cup in Australia, the Men in Blue are in a very strong position to qualify for the semi-finals.
Pakistan's two consecutive losses have further ensured that there is no immediate threat to India's qualification chances.
Today in Perth, Rohit Sharma and co. though are expected to face their toughest test so far.
